author: Lorianne Ard
title: 9 Amazing Ryzen RAM For 2023 | Robots.net
text: If you're on the lookout for the perfect Ryzen RAM to enhance your system's performance, look no further than these 9 amazing options for 2023. With the rapid advancements in technology, investing in the right RAM can significantly impact your computer's speed and efficiency. Whether you're a gamer, a content creator, or simply someone who demands a smooth and seamless computing experience, having the best Ryzen RAM is essential. In this article, we will delve into the top 9 options that are poised to dominate the market in 2023, providing you with an unparalleled computing experience. Overall Score: 9/10 The KINGDEL K15 [Mini PC](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/11-best-mini-pc-for-2023/) is a powerful and compact computer that delivers top-notch performance. Equipped with an AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and 64GB [DDR4 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ddr4-ram/), this mini PC is built for speed and multitasking. It also features a 2TB [SSD](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ssd/) for ample storage space. With its AMD Radeon graphics, the K15 Mini PC is capable of handling gaming and graphic-intensive tasks. It comes with [Windows 11](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/pc-tech-reviews/windows-11-is-here-everything-you-need-to-know/) Pro pre-installed, allowing for a seamless user experience. The mini PC has a variety of connectors, including USB 3.2, Display Port, HD, and Type-C, for easy connectivity. With support for WOL and PXE, as well as automatic restart after power loss, this mini PC offers convenience and reliability. The sleek and compact design makes it perfect for use in small spaces. Overall, the KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a high-performance computer that offers great value for its price. Key Features - AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX Processor - 64GB DDR4 RAM, 2TB [M.2 SSD](https://robots.net/tech/9-best-m-2-ssd-for-2023/) - AMD Radeon Graphics, 2100 MHz Graphics Frequency - Multiple connectors for easy connectivity - Supports WOL, PXE, and automatic restart Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.87Lx5.75Wx1.57H - Size: [64GB Ram](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/10-best-64gb-ram-for-2023/)2tb ssd Pros - Powerful processor and ample RAM - Large storage capacity - Supports gaming and graphic-intensive tasks - Pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro - Convenient connectors for easy connectivity - Supports WOL, PXE, and automatic restart Cons - Fan can be noisy under load - Integrated Wi Fi could be better The KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a compact and powerful computer that offers impressive performance. With its AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and 64GB DDR4 RAM, it can handle demanding tasks with ease. The [2TB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/8-best-2tb-ssd-for-2023/) provides ample storage space, and the AMD Radeon graphics ensure smooth gaming and graphics performance. The mini PC comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Pro, offering a seamless and user-friendly experience. The variety of connectors allows for easy connectivity with external devices. While the fan can be a bit noisy under load and the integrated [WiFi](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/11-amazing-wifi-for-2023/) could be improved, these minor drawbacks are outweighed by the overall performance and value of this mini PC. Whether for work or play, the KINGDEL K15 Mini PC is a great choice. Overall Score: 8/10 The HP Pavilion Tower Desktop is an impressive computer with high-end specifications, making it suitable for both work and entertainment purposes. It features an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor and 64GB of DDR4 RAM, ensuring smooth multitasking and effortless performance. The 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 [Solid State Drive](https://robots.net/tech/8-amazing-solid-state-drive-for-2023/) provides ample storage space and fast data transfer speeds. With Windows 11 Home as its operating system, users can enjoy a beautiful interface, improved performance features, and compatibility with [Android](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/8-best-android-for-2023/) apps. This bundle also includes a wired [keyboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-keyboard/), mouse, and a KKE Mousepad. The PC supports Wi-Fi 6 and [Bluetooth](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-bluetooth/) connectivity, allowing for seamless wireless connections. Overall, the HP Pavilion Tower Desktop offers a reliable and powerful computing experience. Key Features - 64GB high-bandwidth RAM - 2TB PCIe NVMe [M.2 Solid State Drive](https://robots.net/tech/8-best-m-2-solid-state-drive-for-2023/) - AMD Ryzen 5 5600G Processor with Radeon Graphics - Windows 11 Home operating system - Wired [keyboard and mouse](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/13-best-keyboard-and-mouse-for-2023/)included [Wi-Fi 6](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/wi-fi-6-everything-you-need-to-know/)and Bluetooth connectivity Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 13.28Lx11.93Wx6.12H - Size: 6 [4GB Ram](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-4gb-ram/)| 2TB Ssd Pros - Powerful processor for smooth performance - Large RAM and storage capacity - Windows 11 offers a great user experience - Includes keyboard, mouse, and mousepad - Supports Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth connectivity Cons - No CD/DVD drive included - Some users experienced internet connection issues - Keyboard and mouse could be of better quality The HP Pavilion Tower Desktop is a high-performance PC that delivers impressive speed and reliability. With its powerful AMD Ryzen processor and ample RAM and storage, it can handle demanding tasks with ease. The inclusion of Windows 11 enhances the user experience, providing a more modern and streamlined interface. While the absence of a CD/DVD drive may be a downside for some, it aligns with the current trend of digital media consumption. The keyboard and mouse could be improved in terms of comfort and usability. Overall, the HP Pavilion Tower Desktop offers excellent value for its price, making it a great choice for users in need of a powerful and versatile desktop computer. Overall Score: 7/10 The HP 14" HD Touchscreen Laptop is a reliable and affordable option for those in need of a new laptop. It features a 14" HD touchscreen display, AMD Ryzen 3 5300U processor, and 8GB RAM with a [512GB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/14-best-512gb-ssd-for-2023/). It runs on Windows 11 Home and offers a range of ports for connectivity. The laptop has a sleek black design and comes with a 3-cell 41WHr lithium-ion battery. While some customers have experienced issues with freezing and software, others have found it to be a great budget-friendly option. With a customer rating of 3.9/5, this HP laptop offers good performance and value for money. Key Features - 14" HD Touchscreen Display - AMD Ryzen 3 5300U Processor - High Speed and Multitasking - Windows 11 Home - Ports & Slots Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 12.76Lx8.86Wx0.71H - Size: [8GB RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-8gb-of-ram/)|512GB SSD Pros - Affordable option - Good performance - Sleek black design - Range of ports for connectivity - Fast boot-up speed Cons - Some customers experienced freezing issues - Software issues with pop-ups - Resolution on the [monitor](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-monitor/)can be washed out - Rare instances of freezing and hanging Overall, the HP 14″ HD Touchscreen Laptop offers good value for money with its affordable price and decent performance. While there have been some reports of freezing and software issues, these do not seem to be widespread. The laptop has a sleek black design and a range of ports for connectivity. It also offers fast boot-up speed and a reliable battery life. If you’re looking for an affordable option for everyday use, this HP laptop is definitely worth considering. Overall Score: 7.5/10 The Asus TUF Gaming A16 Laptop packs a powerful punch with its AMD Octa-core Ryzen 7 7735HS processor and impressive 64GB RAM. Its 16" FHD+ display with 165Hz refresh rate and AMD Radeon RX 7600S 8GB Graphic provides smooth and vivid visuals. With a [backlit keyboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-backlit-keyboard/), Dolby sound, AI noise cancellation, and a 720p HD webcam, it offers an immersive gaming experience. The laptop also features fast charging and USB-C connectivity. While the laptop has received mixed reviews, it offers great value for its price. Key Features - 64GB Ram | 2TB Ssd - AMD Octa-core Ryzen 7 7735HS Processor - 16" FHD+ 165Hz – 7ms, Free Sync Premium MUX Switch - AMD Radeon RX 7600S 8GB Graphic - USB-C USB4 Display Port, [HDMI 2.1](https://robots.net/tech/how-do-i-know-if-my-hdmi-is-2-1/)FRL Specifications - Color: Gray - Dimension: 9.92Lx13.98Wx1.06H - Size: 64GB Ram | 2TB Ssd Pros - Powerful processor and ample RAM - High-quality display with fast refresh rate - Good connectivity options including USB-C and [HDMI](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-hdmi-for/) Cons - Mixed reviews and customer ratings - Some complaints about battery discharge and noise The Asus TUF Gaming A16 Laptop offers impressive performance, particularly for gamers, with its powerful processor, abundant RAM, and high-quality display. Its fast refresh rate and smooth graphics enhance the gaming experience, while the inclusion of USB-C and HDMI ports increases connectivity options. However, the laptop has received mixed reviews, with some customers experiencing issues like battery discharge and noise. Despite these drawbacks, the laptop provides good value for its price, making it a worthwhile choice for those looking for a powerful [gaming laptop](https://robots.net/tech/14-best-gaming-laptop-for-2023/) with a budget-friendly price tag. Overall Score: 8/10 The [Dell](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-dell/) 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a powerful and versatile laptop designed for productivity and entertainment. With an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 32GB RAM, and a [1TB SSD](https://robots.net/tech/13-best-1tb-ssd-for-2023/), it provides exceptional speed and performance. The 14-inch FHD+ display delivers stunning visuals, while the AMD Radeon Graphics ensures smooth and immersive gaming. The laptop comes with Windows 11 Pro, offering enhanced features and improved connectivity options. It also features Wi-Fi 6 technology for fast and reliable internet connection. With its sleek design and pebble green color, the Dell 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a stylish and reliable option for users seeking a high-performance laptop. Key Features - AMD Ryzen 7 5825U Processor - 14-inch FHD+ Display - AMD Radeon Graphics - Up to 32GB RAM - Up to 1TB SSD - Windows 11 Pro OS Specifications - Color: Green - Dimension: 12.36Lx0.75Wx8.96H Pros - Powerful processor - Fast boot times - Smooth gaming experience - Ample storage space Cons - Fingerprint marks visible - Limited customer service support The Dell 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop offers impressive performance with its powerful processor, ample RAM, and [fast SSD](https://robots.net/tech/how-fast-is-a-ssd/). The FHD+ display and AMD Radeon Graphics provide stunning visuals and immersive gaming experiences. The laptop is also equipped with Windows 11 Pro, offering enhanced features and improved connectivity options. While the laptop excels in performance, its customer service support may be lacking, which is something to consider. Overall, the Dell 2023 Newest Inspiron 14 Laptop is a stylish and reliable option for users looking for a high-performance laptop. Overall Score: 9/10 The Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series 3525 Business Laptop offers powerful performance and reliable features for business professionals. With upgraded memory and storage, including 32GB DDR4 RAM and a 1TB PCIe [NVMe M.2 SSD](https://robots.net/tech/10-best-nvme-m-2-ssd-for-2023/), you can easily switch between applications and enjoy fast boot-up and data transfer speeds. The laptop is powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 5825U Processor with integrated AMD Radeon Graphics, providing a smooth and efficient computing experience. The 15.6-inch FHD 120Hz screen with anti-glare technology delivers crisp and vibrant visuals. It also comes with Windows 11 Pro, a backlit keyboard, and various connectivity options. Overall, this laptop offers excellent value for its price, making it highly recommended for business users. Key Features [32GB Ddr4 ram](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/10-best-32gb-ddr4-ram-for-2023/) - 1TB Pcie Nvme M.2 Ssd - AMD Ryzen 7 5825U Processor - 15.6-inch FHD 120Hz anti-glare screen - Windows 11 Pro Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 14.11Lx9.27Wx0.67H - Size: 32GB Ram | 1TB Ssd Pros - Powerful performance with upgraded memory and storage - Smooth and efficient computing experience - Crisp and vibrant visuals on the 15.6-inch FHD screen - Comes with Windows 11 Pro and a backlit keyboard - Excellent value for the price Cons The Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series 3525 Business Laptop offers impressive performance, reliable features, and excellent value for its price. With upgraded memory and storage, powerful processor, and a high-quality screen, it provides a smooth and efficient computing experience. The inclusion of Windows 11 Pro and a backlit keyboard further enhance its appeal for business users. Overall, this laptop is a great choice for professionals looking for a reliable and affordable option. Overall Score: 8/10 Experience powerful gaming performance with the HP Victus 15L Gaming Desktop. It is equipped with the high-performance AMD Octa-Core Ryzen 7 5700G processor and 32GB RAM, providing fast and efficient multitasking capabilities. The dedicated AMD Radeon RX 6600XT 8GB graphic card delivers stunning visuals and smooth gameplay. With a large 2TB SSD, you'll have ample storage for your games, files, and multimedia. It comes with Windows 11 pre-installed, offering a user-friendly interface and new features. The compact design and included [HDMI cable](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-an-hdmi-cable-look-like/) make it easy to set up and connect to your display. Overall, the HP Victus 15L Gaming Desktop offers a great gaming experience at an affordable price. Key Features - 32GB Ram | 2TB Ssd - AMD Octa-Core Ryzen 7 5700G Processor - AMD Radeon RX 6600XT 8GB Graphic - USB-C Diplay Port - Windows 11 Home Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 11.71Lx6.10Wx13.27H - Size: 32GB Ram | 2TB Ssd Pros - Powerful processor and dedicated [graphics card](https://robots.net/tech/which-is-the-best-graphics-card/) - Large storage capacity - Compact design - Includes HDMI cable - Affordable price Cons - Preinstalled bloatware - Proprietary power supply connections The HP Victus 15L Gaming Desktop offers impressive gaming performance with its powerful processor, dedicated graphics card, and ample storage. It is a great choice for gamers looking for an affordable gaming desktop. The compact design and included HDMI cable make it easy to set up and connect. However, it does come with preinstalled bloatware, which can be a downside for some users. Additionally, the proprietary power supply connections limit the ability to upgrade the power supply. Overall, the HP Victus 15L Gaming Desktop provides excellent value for its price and is a solid choice for gaming enthusiasts. Overall Score: 8.5/10 The Lenovo legion 5 Slim is a powerful gaming laptop designed to deliver high-performance gaming and multitasking capabilities. With its 16-inch WQXGA display and 165Hz refresh rate, you can enjoy smooth and immersive gameplay. The laptop is powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 processor and comes with 64GB DDR5 RAM and a 2TB [PCIe SSD](https://robots.net/tech/8-best-pcie-ssd-for-2023/) for fast and efficient performance. It also features NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 graphics for stunning visuals and a RGB backlit keyboard for customizable lighting. The laptop has a range of connectivity options including USB, HDMI, and Wi-Fi 6E. Running on Windows 11 Home, the Lenovo legion 5 Slim offers a seamless and user-friendly experience. Key Features - 16" WQXGA IPS display with 165Hz refresh rate - AMD Ryzen 7 processor with 64GB [DDR5 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-best-ddr5-ram/) - 2TB PCIe SSD for fast storage - NVIDIA Ge Force RTX 4060 graphics - RGB backlit keyboard for customizable lighting Specifications - Color: Storm Grey - Dimension: 14.30Lx10.22Wx0.98H - Size: 64GB|2TB SSD Pros - Powerful performance for gaming and multitasking - High-quality display with vibrant colors - Fast and efficient storage - Customizable RGB backlighting - Wide range of connectivity options Cons - Battery life could be better - Laptop tends to heat up quickly The Lenovo legion 5 Slim is a top-notch gaming laptop that offers impressive performance, stunning visuals, and a user-friendly experience. With its powerful AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 64GB DDR5 RAM, and 2TB PCIe SSD, it can handle demanding games and multitasking with ease. The 16-inch WQXGA display with a 165Hz refresh rate provides an immersive gaming experience with vibrant colors. The RGB backlit keyboard adds a touch of customization, and the wide range of connectivity options ensures you can easily connect your favorite peripherals. While the battery life could be better and the laptop tends to heat up quickly, these minor drawbacks are outweighed by the overall performance and features of the Lenovo legion 5 Slim. If you’re looking for a high-performance gaming laptop, this is definitely worth considering. However, users should be cautious of potential heating issues and the limited upgradability of the system. Overall, it is a great choice for gamers who value performance and aesthetics. Ryzen RAM Buyer's Guide Are you planning to build an impressive Ryzen-powered PC but feeling overwhelmed by the choices when it comes to RAM? Worry not! This buyer's guide is here to provide you with all the information you need to make the best decision. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or a gaming aficionado, selecting the right RAM for your Ryzen processor is crucial. So let's dive right in and explore the wonderful world of Ryzen RAM options! Factors to Consider When selecting a RAM for your Ryzen processor, it's important to keep several key factors in mind: - Speed: Ryzen processors are known to perform optimally with higher-speed RAM modules. Consider going for at least DDR4-3200 or even higher if you desire top-notch performance. Increased [RAM speed](https://robots.net/tech/how-do-i-know-my-ram-speed/)helps improve overall system responsiveness and enhances multitasking capabilities. - Capacity: The amount of RAM you require largely depends on your usage patterns. For casual gaming and everyday tasks, 16GB should suffice. However, if you delve into resource-intensive tasks like video editing or 3D rendering, consider opting for 32GB or higher for a smoother experience. - Compatibility: It's crucial to ensure that your chosen RAM module is compatible with your [motherboard](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-motherboard/). Before making a purchase, consult the manufacturer's website or user manual to verify compatibility. Additionally, double-check the number of [RAM slots](https://robots.net/tech/how-many-ram-slots/)on your motherboard to determine whether you prefer a single stick or a dual-channel memory configuration. - Latency and Timings: Though often overlooked, RAM latency and timings play a vital role in system performance. Lower latency leads to faster data retrieval, resulting in improved overall responsiveness. Look for RAM modules with low CAS latency (CL) values for optimal performance. - Budget: Determine your budget beforehand. [RAM module](https://robots.net/tech/what-does-a-ram-module-look-like/)prices can vary significantly depending on capacity, speed, and brand. Be sure to strike a balance between performance and affordability. Types of Ryzen RAM The market offers a variety of RAM options suitable for Ryzen processors. Understand the different types available to make an informed decision: - Single Rank vs. Dual Rank: Dual-rank memory modules provide more performance potential due to their higher density and better data interleaving. They can enhance multitasking capabilities, making them an excellent choice for power users. - XMP Profiles: Many modern RAM modules come with eXtreme Memory Profile (XMP) support. XMP profiles allow you to overclock your RAM to higher frequencies without manually adjusting timings. This feature can make the overclocking process significantly easier for overclocking enthusiasts. - RGB and Aesthetics: If you're someone who loves a visually stunning setup, consider opting for RAM modules with RGB lighting. Many manufacturers offer RAM with customizable RGB lighting, allowing you to create a vibrant and personalized system. - Heat Spreader: RAM modules often come with heat spreaders or heatsinks to dissipate heat and improve thermal performance. While they are not essential for all users, they can be beneficial if you're planning to push your Ryzen processor to its limits. Frequently Asked Questions about 9 Amazing Ryzen RAM For 2023 Yes, Ryzen processors are compatible with DDR4 memory. However, ensure that the RAM module you choose is compatible with your motherboard to avoid any compatibility issues. Ryzen processors benefit from higher RAM speeds due to their architecture. Opting for at least DDR4-3200 or higher can help improve overall system performance, specifically in tasks that are memory-intensive. Both RAM capacity and speed are important factors. If your usage mainly involves everyday tasks and casual gaming, 16GB of faster RAM should be sufficient. However, for resource-intensive tasks like video editing or heavy multitasking, more RAM capacity, accompanied by higher speeds, can greatly enhance performance. CAS latency refers to the time it takes for the RAM to access a specific column of data. Lower CAS latency values indicate faster data retrieval, resulting in better overall system performance. Mixing RAM brands and capacities is possible but not recommended. It can lead to compatibility issues and may not utilize the full potential of your system. It is best to use identical RAM modules from the same brand for optimal performance.
